greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (33+8*sqrt(2))/31.
comment: lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) = (33+8*sqrt(2))/31 for n mod 3 = {1, 2}, b = A118674.
lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) = (33+8*sqrt(2))/31 for n mod 3 = {0, 2}, b = A157646.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: A118674, A157646, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A157648 (decimal expansion of (1539+850*sqrt(2))/31^2).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Mar 11 2009
